title: So hey Riot, you see that shiny symbol thing around champs that shows we got a mastery chest on?
body:
https://i.imgur.com/6YXrSrv.png/img

Like the ones around Garen, Nautilus and Alistar there just to name a few that I got an S rank on getting them in my champion collection?

https://i.imgur.com/v6clabm.png/img

How about putting those things on the champions in the game match making room as well?

For clarityâ„¢ sake? You guys like that stuff don'tcha?

It'd be pretty nice to have.
